## Loading the data

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
load("individuals.rda")

```

```{r}
contributions %>% 
  group_by(state) %>% 
  summarize(s = sum(transaction_amt))
```

```{r}
individuals %>% 
  filter(!is.na(occupation)) %>%
  group_by(occupation) %>% 
  summarize(num_occ = n()) %>% 
  filter(num_occ > 29) %>% 
  arrange(desc(num_occ))
```
